channel.title: Vanguard News » Politics
channel.description: A Nigerian newspaper and Online version of the Vanguard, a daily publication in Nigeria covering Niger delta, general national news, politics, business, energy, sports, entertainment, fashion,lifestyle human interest stories, etc

item.title: POLLS: Jonathan’s violation of zoning agreement cost him victory — Dorgu
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
Charles Dorgu, was a close associate of the late Gen. Shehu Musa Yar‘Adua and member of his Peoples Democratic Movement, PDM as well as a convener of the Peoples Democratic Party, PDP, in his native Bayelsa State. Dorgu served as executive secretary of the Federal Capital Territory Administration, FCTA.

The post POLLS: Jonathan’s violation of zoning agreement cost him victory — Dorgu appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: Why we can’t judge APC govt in Imo now – Agbim
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
Hon. Ken Agbim (PDP, Ahiazu Mbaise Constituency) is one of the six Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) lawmakers in the Imo State House of Assembly. In this interview, the former media and entertainment executive, spoke on his plans for his people, collaboration with other legislators to assist the state government to increase its internally generated revenue and why it is too early to judge the All Progressives Congress, APC government in the state.

The post Why we can’t judge APC govt in Imo now – Agbim appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: 2016: I see a Buhari revolution in Edo — Imasuagbon
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
Kenneth Imasuagbon who hails from Ewohimi, Edo Central, is a lawyer, educationist, administrator and politician. In this interview, Imasuagbon who recently dumped the the Peoples Democratic Party, PDP, for the All Progressives Congress, APC, bares his mind on a lot of issues ranging from how he stepped down for Governor Adams Oshiomhole of Edo State, Edo politics and the 2016 governorship elections in the state among others.

The post 2016: I see a Buhari revolution in Edo — Imasuagbon appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: A-Ibom APC in fresh leadership crisis
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
The Akwa Ibom state chapter of the All Progressives Congress APC is locked in another leadership crisis following the recent suspension of 41 officers and party elders.

The post A-Ibom APC in fresh leadership crisis appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: N30 billion loan: Conspiracy, craft in Abia House
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
The Abia State House of Assembly may be heading for a major crisis as some lawmakers elected on the platform of the opposition All Progressive Grand Alliance, APGA, have accused the Speaker, Martin Azubuike, of deceiving them over the N30bn loan recently approved for the state government.

The post N30 billion loan: Conspiracy, craft in Abia House appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: Fuel subsidy under Jonathan rose from N300 bn to N1.9 tn, yet he wanted more money – Amaechi
item.dc:creator: adekunle
item.description:
Former Gov. Rotimi Amaechi of Rivers said on Monday in Abuja that the victory of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in this year’s general elections was engineered by God.

The post Fuel subsidy under Jonathan rose from N300 bn to N1.9 tn, yet he wanted more money – Amaechi appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: How lack of power, money fuel disloyalty in PDP
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
The unfolding crisis in the PDP was one that had over time been covered up on account of the party’s previous hold of the apparatus of government. Now denied of such, the bubble easily burst given the absence of the mixture of power and money that had until recently kept the workers and the party leaders united.

The post How lack of power, money fuel disloyalty in PDP appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: Crises in the parties: PDP, APC on the brink
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
It was not surprising that when staff of the Peoples Democratic Party, PDP openly confronted the party’s national leaders over alleged multibillion wastages, that the opposition party responded by alleging an infiltration of its ranks by its political nemesis, the All Progressives Congress, APC.

The post Crises in the parties: PDP, APC on the brink appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: Death of ‘Dogara Zoning-Formula’ : How Reps sacrificed federal character, excluded Igbo
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
For over 50 days after the House of Representatives was inaugurated, the leadership knew no peace. Sleep apparently took flight from Speaker Yakubu Dogara and his deputy, Yussuf Lasu, while nocturnal meetings, blackmail and accusation of disobedience to the All Progressives Congress, APC, the party that produced them were the order of the day.

The post Death of ‘Dogara Zoning-Formula’ : How Reps sacrificed federal character, excluded Igbo appeared first on Vanguard News.

item.title: Goodbye Awo, welcome Buhari
item.dc:creator: Femi Ajasa
item.description:
The late Chief Obafemi Awolowo and President Muhammadu Buhari might have lived at different times but, like identical twins, possess many things in common-dynamism, pragmatism, integrity, self- discipline, vision and passion-to make Nigeria work. The impeccable past of these tested leaders has proved that the bane of the country’s slow development since independence has been lack of purposeful leadership.

The post Goodbye Awo, welcome Buhari appeared first on Vanguard News.
